9) Automation (Cron)
```
crontab -e
0 2 * * * /usr/bin/python3 /srv/memory-git/exporter.py >> /var/log/memory_exporter.log
2>&1
```
Runs nightly at 2am; rotates nonce at most once per 24 hours.
10) How to Share with ChatGPT/Claude
After each export, copy the two URLs below **with the actual nonce** and paste them
into chat:
1) Search map:
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/HoffmanM361/memory-
mirror/main/catalog/<NONCE>/search_map_<NONCE>.json

2) One shard (e.g., memory):
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/HoffmanM361/memory-
mirror/main/catalog/<NONCE>/shards/by_tag/memory.json
I (or Claude) will traverse `chunk_urls` from there.

11) Verification Checklist (Phone‑Friendly)
☐ Open the nonce search map URL; confirm pretty JSON and a `tokens` object.
☐ Open a shard under the same nonce path; confirm it’s multi‑line and modest size.
☐ Open one chunk under `chunks/<NONCE>/...` (~2 KB per file).
☐ Open meta/latest_build.json; verify the `nonce` matches the URLs you shared.

12) Rotation & Revocation
• To rotate immediately: delete `.current_nonce` and re‑run exporter — a new nonce is
minted.
• Old nonces are pruned automatically, keeping only the latest N (`KEEP_NONCES`).
• For hard removal from history, rewrite Git history with `git filter-repo` (optional,
advanced).
13) Troubleshooting
• 404 on shard/chunk → Ensure the **same nonce** is present in the URL path and file
name.
• Single‑line JSON → Confirm exporter uses `indent=2`.
• Mirror empty → Set `public` flags or broaden tag inference.
• Too big → Lower `MAX_ITEMS_PER_SHARD`.
